description: A React component for a ride request form allowing users to input pickup and destination locations, preview routes, and submit ride requests. It manages form state, handles user input, communicates with route and API utility functions, and provides user feedback.

methods.name: parseLatLng
methods.description: Utility function to parse a string in 'lat,lng' format into an array of two floating-point numbers.

methods.name: handlePreview
methods.description: Asynchronous function that fetches a route preview based on input locations and triggers the onRoutePreview callback.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Asynchronous function that sends a trip request to the backend API and triggers the onTripCreated callback, or creates a fake trip on error.

ctags.name: RideRequestForm
ctags.pattern: /^export default function RideRequestForm({ userLocation, onRoutePreview, onTripCreated }) {$/

ctags.name: body
ctags.pattern: /^      const body = { pickup: { lat: p[0], lng: p[1] }, destination: { lat: d[0], lng: d[1] } };$/

ctags.name: destination
ctags.pattern: /^      const body = { pickup: { lat: p[0], lng: p[1] }, destination: { lat: d[0], lng: d[1] } };$/

ctags.name: fakeTrip
ctags.pattern: /^      const fakeTrip = { id: `trip_${Date.now()}`, status: 'requested', pickup, dropoff };$/

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^      const fakeTrip = { id: `trip_${Date.now()}`, status: 'requested', pickup, dropoff };$/

ctags.name: lat
ctags.pattern: /^      const body = { pickup: { lat: p[0], lng: p[1] }, destination: { lat: d[0], lng: d[1] } };$/

ctags.name: pickup
ctags.pattern: /^      const body = { pickup: { lat: p[0], lng: p[1] }, destination: { lat: d[0], lng: d[1] } };$/

ctags.pattern: /^      const fakeTrip = { id: `trip_${Date.now()}`, status: 'requested', pickup, dropoff };$/

ctags.pattern: /^      const fakeTrip = { id: `trip_${Date.now()}`, status: 'requested', pickup, dropoff };$/

fields.name: const fakeTrip = { id: `trip_${Date.now()}`, status: 'requested', pickup, dropoff };
const body = { pickup: { lat: p[0], lng: p[1] }, destination: { lat: d[0], lng: d[1] } };
